GSD.description:
firmware: arm_scpi: Ensure scpi_info is not assigned if the probe fails

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.4.211 by commit 18048cba444a7c41dbf42c180d6b46606fc24c51. For more details please see the references link.
